Continue

He examined himself and was rather intrigued with his new body. He had a lot on his mind but didn't remember how or when he got into prison. He saw a person that was sitting across the room. He wanted to know.
Scott: Hello.
?: Hello there.

What happens next?
122.title: Talk to the person across the room

1221.content: Scott looked closer and saw that the person was a black wolf sitting crosslegged on the floor. He was wearing shades, a suit, fedora, and casual dress shoes. The black wolf lowered his glasses, giving Scott a curious look, and said:"So, Scott, I see you're new to this thing we call life. My name is Xavier, pleased to meet you." Xavier then stood up, walked over to the cell door, and pointed each of his digits at an individual cell bar. Scott, confused, asked:"Um, who are you? And what are you doing?" Xavier looked at Scott and said:"I told you, my name is Xavier." He then gave Scott a manic grin, and then concentrated flames burst out from Xavier's fingers at the iron bars, which melted around the flames from the intensed heat. Xavier stepped back and said:"Wait for it..." Then, the bars crackled and disintegrated before Scott's eyes. Xavier then calmly stepped over the bottom of the cell and said to Scott:"So, my new friend, you coming or not?"

125.content:
Continue
Scott meets Miley.
Scott was emotionless in his prison cell. He wasn't chained and the cell didn't even have bars. All it had was a couch and broken chains. However he now decided to escape but how would he accomplish such a feat.
Suddenly he heard a soft footsteps. His ear twitched and he turned his head to see who it was that was coming in. The footsteps came closer and closer and soon he saw a black furred hedgehog carrying a sword.
"Who was this hedgehog?", he thought. However the hedgehog looked around and said, "Come with me, quick we don't have much time!"
Scott quickly reacted and ran out of his cheap cell. However something went wrong. As he ran he was soon electrocuted and he fell to the floor. The strange hedgehog knew that he would need his help if they were going to get out of there.
The hedgehog quickly observed him and noticed a small hatch. He opened it and pulled out a red device. Scott got up and wasn't being electrocuted anymore. The hedgehog stuffed the wires back in and closed the hatch. They both ran.
As the two ran, the stranger said, "My name is Night, I am here to save you." They were both making good progress as they neared the exit. However they were soon spotted by a camera.

What happens next?

Scott: Hey Miley. You told me that you found me out in the feilds of Green Meadows?
Miley: Yeah a couple of moths ago I found you passed out in the grass. I couldn't see why but I knew you needed help.

Miley is a black-furred hedgehog that wears a yellow dress. Miley is a kind and cheery type of girl. She likes seeing other people happy and she has force powers like Scott. She is a year older than Scott and she has more experience with her powers. She doesn't know much about Scott except the fact that she found him passed out in the meadows. (Hypon sees a pratisite on Raditiz's fur) Hypon: Now i see why. (Pulls the praitisite and makes burn badly) Raditiz: What the.. Why am i in the chair?
133112121121121121.title: Continue

1331121211211211211.content:
Continue
Raditz and Hypon
Radtz: Why am I in the chair.
Hypon: You put yourself in a bad situation. Gricer infected you with a parasite.
Raditz: Gricer I thought it was Glacier.
Hypon: No Blizzard is part of the Elementals.
Raditz: Why am I here.
Hypon: I will get you out. You need some more time.

What happens next?
1331121211211211211.title: Continue

13311212112112112112.content: Raditiz: Hypon, I know his plan, He is about to attack The Sky Clan next. Hypon: Are you Sure, Raditiz? Raditiz: Yes i saw the plan. Hypon: Thanks Brother, but i cant decide your fate, Dark must choose.
13311212112112112112.title: Raditz has some news

133112121121121121121.content:
Continue
Hypon and Raditz.
Hypon: Dark has to decide your fate. Best of luck to you bro. (leaves)
Hypon comes to Dark
Hypon: I spoke with him and he told me that Gricer is planning on attacking the Sky clan.
Dark: (looks at Hypon oddly) Bad news the Sky clan disbanded. They would now be considered rebels.
Hypon: What! How and when did this happen.
Dark: It happened a couple of months ago. I was reported several times.

What happens next?
133112121121121121121.title: Continue

1331121211211211211212.content: Hypon: Then Glacier is going to recriut them for his Army. Dark: No they wouldnt. Hypon: I know what hes going to do Dark. Glacier will takeover the world by brainwashing them like Raditiz.
1331121211211211211212.title: Continue

13311212112112112112122.content:
Continue
Dark and Hypon
Dark: Gricer isn't the parasite king...if there were one. The parasites are their own problem
Hypon: Well Glacier figured out a way to manipulate them.
Dark: Glacier? I thought he was a elemental.
Hypon: Elemental? I thought they were extinct.
Dark: Gricer is a Darkite as you know and how do you know so much about his plan?
Hypon: I actually have access to the crystal of time.
Dark: Where did you come from? Are you a ancient because that gem has been destroyed long ago.

What happens next?
13311212112112112112122.title: Dark doubts

133112121121121121121221.content: Hypon: No, My father was thought but Glacier killed him. And that gem wasnt destroyed, I took its power from My father before he died. I have so many reason to kill Glacier and I will do for my Tribe and my father. My father died a Hero but with an unmarked grave, now Glacier will share his fate.
133112121121121121121221.title: Continue

choices: A arrow flies by Dark's wings
1331121211211211211212211.content:
Continue
Dark and Hypon
Dark: Why would Glacier attack your father?
Hypon: He wants the Darkites to take over.
Dark: But what about Gricer.
Hypon: Wait what are you talking about.
Dark: You obviously don't remember the past times. How the crystal of time survived is another question. Your father wasn't killed by Glacier either. Gricer is the son of Blitz, the ancient Darkite leader. He killed your father not Glacier. Glacier was the protector of the crystal of time before his brother Pyro claimed to destroy it. However Gricer took Blitz' place after he was reported dead from unknown causes. So where did you come from?
Hypon: What is this true?
Dark: Most of it but I don't know. Because what you are telling me is that the crystal of time has survived.
Hypon: It's true.

What happens next?
1331121211211211211212211.title: Continue

13311212112112112112122111.content: (Hypon) (Pulls out a brace) His hold a part of the Gem of Time. I'm the only one who hasnt used its power for evil.
13311212112112112112122111.title: Continue

133112121121121121121221111.content:
Continue
Dark and Hypon
Dark: You show it boldly.
Hypon: Yes but I understand it's power.
Dark: So you would know its stability.
Hypon: Yes most can't control it because of it radiation.

What happens next?
133112121121121121121221111.title: Continue

1331121211211211211212211112.content: Hypon sees behind Dark and shes a female Night-Blood Wolf who became a Shadow after the fall of the village. Hypon: Yo-ay? Yo-ay: Hypon?
1331121211211211211212211112.title: Hypon sees a wolf

choices: They go outside of the cave
13311212112112112112122111121.content:
Continue
She was a Night-blood that became a Shadow before the village was destroyed. However she was a human that became a wolf from a parasite. She was brought to Metropolis but she doesn't remember how.
Yo-ay: Hypon? I haven't seen you in ages.
Dark: What are you doing here? I figure that you have some news.
Hypon: I thought you were captured.
Yo-ay: Well I was but Gricer recently let me go.
Dark: I assigned you some "special work" in the forest.
Yo-ay: Well I came to get something important.

What happens next?
13311212112112112112122111121.title: Continue

133112121121121121121221111211.content: Hypon: Do you mean this File on the parasites and thier weakness. Yo-ay: What! How did you find it! Hypon: That, my dear, is Classifed information.
133112121121121121121221111211.title: Continue

1331121211211211211212211112111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Yo-ay.
Yo-ay: (sees a parasite behind Hypon) Hypon watch out!
Hypon: (Turns around) For whoa! (dodges the demented looking hedgehog)
Parasite: (shrieks and turns around)

What happens next?
1331121211211211211212211112111.title: Continue

choices: Dark wants to know how the crystal of time survived
1331121211211211211212212.content:
Continue
Scott and Miley appear.
Scott: Glacier? I thought he died.
Hypon: Glacier is the Darkite leader.
Miley: You mean Gricer. Galcier was a ancient elemental that had son named Blizzard.
Dark: Your father wasn't killed by Galcier.
Hypon: What? Then who killed him.
Dark: Blitz the ancient Darkite king. He had a son named Gricer which is currently the Darkite leader.

What happens next?
1331121211211211211212212.title: Scott and Miley appear

133112121121122.content:
Continue
Hypon and Scott
Hypon: (punches through a wall and it breaks) I can't believe this!
Scott: (eyes glow and causes the wall to repair itself)
Hypon: Whoa! I didn't know you can control time.
Scott: I can't. Force has to do with levitation...I think.
Miley: I hope your brother hasn't been affected by any parasites.
Hypon: I just hope that Dark goes easy on him.

What happens next?
133112121121122.title: Continue

choices: Raditz calls for backup and attacks
1331121211212.content:
Continue
Raditz and Scott
Raditz: Look who's catching on. Now prepare to die. (forms a energy ball)
Scott: (eyes begin glowing white)
Hypon: (pulls out a blade)
Miley: (her eyes begin glowing)
Hypon: There is no way that you will beat the three of us. Now leave!

What happens next?
1331121211212.title: Contiune

13311212112121.content: (Raditiz) I'll be Back for you, Hypon. (disappers) (Hypon) (puts Blade back in) He is stupid to attack all of us at once. (Scott) But why would he? (Hypon) A warning of a war to begin. (Miley) A war!!! Bewteen Darkites and Shadows? (Hypon) Yes. But i can get the other clans to help the Shadows.
13311212112121.title: Raditz leaves

133112121121211.content:
Continue
Hypon and Scott
Hypon: The other clans can help us. I will get them.
Miley: Wait how are you a part of the other clans?
Hypon: Long story.
Scott: Must be hard being a rebel.
Hypon: I guess you can say that.

What happens next?
133112121121211.title: Continue

1331121211212111.content: (Hypon) So how will he get each group to join our cause?
1331121211212111.title: Continue

13311212112121111.content:
Continue
Scott has a plan.
Scott: How about we start with the Shadows. We are already a part of them.
Hypon: Alright you can lead us to their base or camp.

What happens next?
13311212112121111.title: Scott's idea

133112121121211112.content: (Scott) Stop Guys i hear something. (Hypon) What is it (gets hit from behind) (A shadow comes and drags Hypon's body away)
133112121121211112.title: Scott hears something.

choices: Scott is hit with a arrow
1331121211212111121.content:
Continue
A Shadow captures Hypon
Hypon: (dazed) Who or what just hit me?
?: You are not welcome here.
Scott: It's Bullseye. (purple hedgehog that is a specialized in weapons)(can teleport) Hey he is good.
Bullseye: Remember I left.
Miley: (eyes start glowing)(chases Bullseye)
Hypon: (forces Bullseye to release him by using a fireball)
Bullseye: Ow! So you want to do this the hard way. (teleports and pulls out a bow and arrow)
Scott: Where is he.
Hypon: (looks around) Hmm

What happens next?
1331121211212111121.title: Continue

13311212112121111212.content: When Bullseye distracted with Scott, Hypon was grabbed again,but this time by a female shadow. Miley didnt see him taken by this Shadow but she went to look for Dark.
13311212112121111212.title: Hypon gets grabbed again

133112121121211112121.content:
Continue
Hypon's point of view.
Hypon: (being dragged around a corner) Hey let me go. (thinking) "Who in the world grabbed me?"
?: What's your buisness here!
Hypon: (turns his head and sees her face) Yo-ay? (you way)
Yo-ay: Shh, come with me. I have to talk with you in private.

What happens next?
133112121121211112121.title: Hypon's POV

1331121211212111121211.content: (Hypon) Yo-ay its been so long. (Yo-ay) I know Hypon but now isnt the time to be friendly. Why are you here? (Hypon) We're planning an attack on the Darkite Clan. (Yo-ay) Ha! You will never win againest them, Hypon. (Hypon) Yo-ay i never told you my true species, I am the rarest wolf breed.
1331121211212111121211.title: Continue

13311212112121111212111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Yo-ay
Hypon: Yeah I can't do it alone and I wasn't trying too.
Yo-ay: Yeah I figured but how will you convince all the tribes to join in the battle.
Hypon: Well the Darkites are already in the Shadow territory so the Shadows are or will be technically in the war. The Sunshines never like the Darkites so they should want to join. The only problem is that I will never be able to gather every clan up before the Darkites take over.
Yo-ay: True so who are you going to get to help?
Hypon: Whoever I can but for now I am going to lay low... Say are you a ninja.
Yo-ay: Yes I still have my capabilities. Why do you ask?
Hypon: I need you to keep track of the Darkites.
Yo-ay: I will do it but you know that Dark wouldn't like it. Especially since...well you know.
Hypon: Yeah I "left" but it was for the betterment of the planet.

What happens next?
13311212112121111212111.title: Continue

133112121121211112121111.content: Meanwhile with Scott and Miley, They just defeated Bullseye. (Scott) Phew he's gotten stronger. (Miley) Yeah but now we need to find Dark, come on Hypon (looks where Hypon was) Hypon....where are you....Great, Just great, now we have to find Dark and Hypon. Back with Hypon and Yo-ay. (Hypon) I must speak to Dark and the others.
133112121121211112121111.title: Meanwhile with Miley and Scott

1331121211212111121211111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Yo-ay
Yo-ay: Hmm, maybe I could convince Dark to reason with you.
Hypon: Maybe...(hears some footsteps) Hold on someone is coming.

What happens next?
1331121211212111121211111.title: Continue

13311212112121111212112.content:
Continue
Yo-ay and Hypon.
Hypon: I am the rarest breed of wolf.
Yo-ay: I know and I am a healer.
Dark emerges from the shadows.
Dark: So I finally found you.
Hypon: (growls) You will never capture the both of us.
Dark: Alone I won't but I didn't come to make prisoners.
Hypon: Then what did you come for.
Dark: I will show you. Follow me.

What happens next?
13311212112121111212112.title: Dark finds them

133112121121211112121122.content: (Hypon) Dark, we dont need to be enemies. (Dark) You left the Shadows over a little rebellion. (Hypon) I would of been killed and so would you. (Dark) How do you know? (Hypon) I see things no one else can.
133112121121211112121122.title: Continue

1331121211212111121211221.content:
Continue
Dark and Hypon
Hypon: I can see things that no one else can.
Dark: That's why we are in this situation. I have never been the same since you left the Darkites.
Hypon: I thought you were a Shadow.
Dark: I am neither. I was banished because of you.
Hypon: No I had nothing to do with it.
Miley: Guys stop arguing. We have more important things to deal with.

What happens next?
1331121211212111121211221.title: Continue

13311212112121111212112211.content: Hypon: Then it looks like we have something the other one wants. Dark: And what is that? Hypon: You want the Shadows back and I want to destroy the Darkites. (Yo-ay) What are you saying? Hypon: I can help you and you help me.
13311212112121111212112211.title: Continue

choices: Dark says, "Help Scott and Miley then. I am out of here."
133112121121211112121122112.content:
Continue
Dark and Hypon
Dark: I don't want to deal with another clan. I would rather live on my own, like I have been doing for years.
Hypon: So you would rather let the Darkites destroy us and you for your sake!
Dark: You don't understand Darkites.
Hypon: Well I am offering my help.

What happens next?
133112121121211112121122112.title: Dark disagrees

133112121121211112122.content:
Continue
Miley and Bullseye.
Miley: What do you want?
Bullseye: You know what I am looking for.
Scott: You will never get the crystal.
Bullseye: Fine then I will have you two for bounty!

What happens next?
133112121121211112122.title: Miley's POV

choices: Someone stops them along the way
13311212112121112.content:
Continue
Miley has a idea.
Miley: How about we start with the Sunshines. They would be easy because their king knows us well.
Hypon: Okay we will follow you to the Light village's capital, Sunshine city.
Miley starts to walk them out of the cave.

What happens next?
13311212112121112.title: Miley's Idea

133112121121211121.content: (Ace) Halt who goes there. (Sees Hypon) Hello Prince Hypon. You may enter the camp. (Sees Miley) Hello Miley. You may enter as well. (Sees Scott) Hello Darkite (growls) Why are you here? (Scott looks confused at Ace) (Hypon) Ace are u feeling well?
133112121121211121.title: Someone stops them along the way

1331121211212111211.content:
Continue
Hypon and Ace. (sunshine messenger and guard. Has hypno powers with music. Can also shoot arrows but is also good at close combat)
Ace: What do you mean?
Hypon: Your eyes are red and you seem a little crazy.
Ace: I am tired. Knoxis had me up last night protecting the light crystal.
Scott: Are you sure. I hope it's not a parasite situation.

What happens next?
1331121211212111211.title: Continue

13311212112121112111.content: Hypon) Ace, why dont you lay down, I think the next guard is coming to take your post. (Ace) Ok, Hypon, but you should know that your brother came down here and try to kill me. (Miley) oh dear. (Hypon) Dont worry, His fall will be hard.
13311212112121112111.title: Continue

choices: Hypon sees something flying in the sky
133112121121211121111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Ace
Hypon: Don't worry his fall will be hard.
Ace: (flies away)
Scott: What are you doing, Hypon?
Hypon: Going to check on the light crystal. I also need to find Knoxis.
Miley: Hmm why would you need to see the light crystal?

What happens next?
133112121121211121111.title: Continue

1331121211212111211111.content: Hypon: I need to see it for a reason. Miley: Why? Hypon: I was a guard here and then i heard Dark was recruiting so i told the leader to hold something of mine and he placed it in the camber of the light crystal.
1331121211212111211111.title: Continue

13311212112121112111111.content:
Continue
Miley and Hypon
Miley: Alright then let's go in.
They walk up the steps of a white building and reach a door. There were two guards in front of the door.
Hypon: (Approaches a guardian) I am here with my friends to recover my crystal.
Guard 1: (looks him over) Approved.
Guard 2: Approved. You may enter.
Hypon, Miley, and Scott enter a dark room with the guards following them.
Hypon: Follow me.

What happens next?
13311212112121112111111.title: Continue

133112121121211121111111.content: Hypon: Ah here we are (finds a pair of gloves) (Miley) i thought you said crystal. (Hypon) I fused them with a crystal. (scott) Ah.
133112121121211121111111.title: Continue

1331121211212111211111111.content:
Continue
Scott and Hypon
Scott: Ah, harmony.
Hypon: What?
Scott: When you bind with a crystal you develop harmony. When you develop harmony you put on a crystal lock.
Hypon: Oh and the crystal becomes mine. Got it.
Miley: Why would someone as powerful as you want a crystal?
Hypon: It's in my nature.

What happens next?
1331121211212111211111111.title: Continue

info.brief_description: The starting of Scott the fox. Was he born or made?
info.description:
Rules
1.) No cursing
2.) No sex or nudity of any kind
3.) No death of any main characters even if they are your own. (violence is allowed)
4.) other characters can be added as long as they make sense in the story or are approved by me.
5.) Have fun

Scott was he born or made? Noone knows much about him not even his friend Miley. Scott is a fox with force powers, but not like the one in Star Wars. Read to find out more

(I will add to this story on ocassions so patience is appreciated)
